item.title: 法国政府表示，欧盟与南方共同市场的贸易协议仍需努力才能为法国所接受
item.description: 法国政府发言人周三表示，法国仍无法接受欧盟与南美贸易集团南方共同市场（Mercosur）谈判达成的贸易协议的现有形式。【原文：A trade deal negotiated between the European Union and the South American trade bloc Mercosur is still not acceptable for France in its current form, a French government spokesperson said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 梯瓦寻求初创企业帮助解决全球制药难题
item.description: 梯瓦制药工业公司（Teva Pharmaceutical Industries）周三表示，该公司正在呼吁初创企业加入其新平台，以开发应对梯瓦和全球制药业所面临的一系列挑战的技术。【原文：Teva Pharmaceutical Industries said on Wednesday it was calling on startups to join its new platform to develop technologies to deal with a host of challenges facing Teva and the global pharmaceuticals industry.】

item.title: Meta 将在 12 月 10 日前屏蔽澳大利亚青少年的 Facebook 和 Instagram
item.description: Meta 公司周四表示，将在 12 月 10 日前阻止 16 岁以下的澳大利亚用户访问 Instagram、Facebook 和 Threads，以遵守该国针对青少年的全面社交媒体禁令。【原文：Meta will block Australian users under 16 from accessing Instagram, Facebook and Threads by December 10 to comply with the country’s sweeping social media ban for teenagers, the company said on Thursday.】

item.title: 英伟达与 Menlo Micro 合作加速人工智能芯片测试
item.description: 英伟达（Nvidia）和Menlo Micro公司周三表示，他们已利用这家初创公司的技术大幅加快了人工智能芯片的测试速度，缓解了生产上的一个重大瓶颈。【原文：Nvidia and Menlo Micro on Wednesday said they have used technology from the startup to dramatically speed up the testing of AI chips, easing a significant production bottleneck.】

item.title: G20 金融监督机构支持监管现代化
item.description: 全球金融监管机构周三表示，明年的首要任务是实现监管现代化、调整有关稳定币的规则以及监控不断膨胀的债务和私人信贷市场。【原文：Modernising regulations, aligning rules around stablecoins and keeping tabs on ballooning debt and private credit markets are next year's top priorities, global financial regulators said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国将在未来几天内降低对瑞士的关税
item.description: 瑞士政府在上周达成初步协议后表示，美国和瑞士正在努力争取在未来几天内将美国对瑞士的关税从39%降至15%。【原文：The United States and Switzerland are working towards implementing a reduction in U.S. tariffs on Switzerland to 15% from 39% in the coming days, the Swiss government said after it sealed an initial deal last week.】

item.title: 在大科技公司的反对下，欧盟将把 "高风险 "人工智能规则推迟到 2027 年实施
item.description: 欧盟委员会周三提议精简和放宽一系列科技法规，包括推迟实施《人工智能法案》的部分条款，以减少繁文缛节，抵制大科技公司的批评，提高欧洲的竞争力。【原文：The European Commission proposed on Wednesday streamlining and easing a slew of tech regulations, including delaying some provisions of its AI Act, in an attempt to cut red tape, head off criticism from Big Tech and boost Europe's competitiveness.】

item.title: TJ Maxx 母公司 TJX 上调年度利润预期
item.description: TJX Cos 周三上调了年度利润预期，预计广泛的采购策略和季节性库存将吸引追求低价的购物者光顾其非价格商店。【原文：TJX Cos raised annual profit forecast on Wednesday, anticipating that broad sourcing strategy and seasonal inventory will attract bargain-hunting shoppers to its off-price stores.】

item.title: Adobe 将以 19 亿美元收购软件供应商 Semrush
item.description: Photoshop 制造商 Adobe 公司周三表示，将以 19 亿美元的价格收购软件平台 Semrush。【原文：Photoshop maker Adobe will acquire software platform Semrush in a $1.9 billion deal, the companies said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 巴西贷款机构 BRB 将聘请审计公司调查与 Banco Master 有关的事实
item.description: 巴西国有银行巴西商业银行（BRB）周三表示，其董事会决定聘请一家专门的外部审计公司，对针对中型贷款机构 Banco Master 的警方行动的相关事实进行调查。【原文：Brazilian state-run bank BRB said on Wednesday that its board decided to hire a specialized external audit firm to investigate the facts related to a police operation which targeted mid-sized lender Banco Master.】

item.title: 投资者从贝莱德旗舰产品比特币 ETF 撤回创纪录的 5.23 亿美元资金
item.description: 根据 Farside Investors 的数据，周二投资者从贝莱德的旗舰产品 iShares 比特币信托基金中撤资约 5.23 亿美元，创下该基金自推出以来的最大单日撤资纪录。【原文：Investors pulled roughly $523 million from BlackRock's flagship iShares Bitcoin Trust on Tuesday, according to data from Farside Investors, marking the fund's largest single-day withdrawal since its launch.】

item.title: 拉里-萨默斯在爱泼斯坦邮件事件后辞去 OpenAI 董事会职务
item.description: 美国前财政部长、哈佛大学前校长拉里-萨默斯（Larry Summers）周一表示，他将退出所有公共事务，并补充说此举是为了让他 "重建信任，修复与我最亲近的人之间的关系"。【原文：Former U.S. Treasury Secretary Larry Summers, also a former president of Harvard University, said on Monday he would step back from all public commitments, adding that the move was to allow him "to rebuild trust and repair relationships with the people closest to me."】

item.title: 早间新闻英伟达暂停技术溃退，日本受到冲击
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 塔吉特季度销售额降幅大于预期，为关键节假日做准备
item.description: 塔吉特周三公布的季度可比销售额降幅大于预期，原因是资金紧张的美国消费者减少了在服装和家居装饰上的自由支配支出。【原文：Target on Wednesday reported a bigger-than-expected drop in quarterly comparable sales as cash-strapped U.S. consumers pulled back discretionary spending on apparel and home decor.】

item.title: 阿切尔与沙特实体合作开发和测试空中滑行业务
item.description: Archer Aviation 周三表示，它已与沙特阿拉伯公共投资基金（Public Investment Fund）旗下的直升机公司（The Helicopter Company）和豪华开发商红海全球公司（Red Sea Global）签署了一项协议，将在沙特开发、测试并可能部署电动飞机。【原文：Archer Aviation said on Wednesday it has signed a deal with The Helicopter Company and luxury developer Red Sea Global, both owned by Saudi Arabia's Public Investment Fund, to develop, test and potentially deploy electric aircraft in the Kingdom.】

item.title: 参议院将就加密货币监管问题对特朗普挑选的 CFTC 负责人进行质询
item.description: 美国参议员们将于周三向唐纳德-特朗普总统提名的商品期货交易委员会领导人迈克尔-塞利格（Michael Selig）询问他对加密货币监管和选举投注等热点问题的改革计划。【原文：U.S. senators are set on Wednesday to press Michael Selig, President Donald Trump's nominee to lead the Commodity Futures Trading Commission, about his plans to overhaul cryptocurrency regulations and election betting, among other hot-button issues.】

item.title: 诺基亚实施以人工智能为重点的新战略，目标到 2028 年利润增长 60
item.description: 诺基亚周三公布了一项以人工智能为重点的新战略，该战略旨在简化业务，并在未来三年内将年度核心利润提高多达 60%。【原文：Nokia unveiled a new strategy on Wednesday focused on artificial intelligence, as it strives to simplify its business and boost annual core profit by as much as 60% over the next three years.】

item.title: 比特币跌破 90,000 美元后反弹，创 7 个月新低
item.description: 比特币在创下低于 90,000 美元的七个月新低后，周二小幅走高，在一些投资者不愿接受风险的市场中找到了买家。【原文：Bitcoin was trading slightly higher on Tuesday after hitting a seven-month low below $90,000, finding buyers in a market where some investors have been reluctant to embrace risk.】

item.title: 劳氏公司下调年度预期，家居装修支出陷入困境
item.description: 受经济不确定性和顽固通胀的影响，今年美国人推迟了在大件家居装修上的支出，劳氏公司与竞争对手家得宝一样，预计全年利润和销售额都将保持低迷。【原文：Lowe's Cos joined rival Home Depot in projecting muted annual profit and sales, in a year marked by Americans delaying spending on big-ticket home renovations due to economic uncertainty and stubborn inflation.】

item.title: 慕佰仕寻求在美国企业高层中提升形象
item.description: 来自雪佛龙、高通、思科、通用动力和辉瑞的首席执行官将出席在华盛顿肯尼迪中心举行的美国-沙特投资论坛。【原文：CEOs from Chevron, Qualcomm, Cisco, General Dynamics and Pfizer will attend the U.S.-Saudi Investment Forum at the Kennedy Center in Washington.】

item.title: 美联储会议纪要有望详述可能正在加深的政策分歧
item.description: 在美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）担任最高职位的最后几个月里，政策制定者们在应对官方数据封锁、现有信息发出的相互矛盾的信号以及领导层交接等问题时出现了分歧，该行 10 月 28-29 日的会议纪要可能会让人们更深入地了解这些分歧的深度。【原文：The minutes of the bank's October 28-29 meeting could provide more insight into the depth of the divide that has emerged among policymakers navigating an official data blackout, conflicting signals from available information, and a leadership transition during the final months of Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell's tenure in the top job.】

item.title: 美联储下调什么？进入年底，流动性趋紧，美国回购利率仍居高不下
item.description: 美国回购市场的隔夜融资成本一直居高不下，尽管美联储最近采取了宽松政策，但预计到年底仍将继续走高，这给本已脆弱的金融市场又增添了一层压力。【原文：The cost of U.S. overnight funding in the repo market has stayed stubbornly high and is expected to remain elevated going into year-end despite recent Federal Reserve easing, adding another layer of stress to already fragile financial markets.】

item.title: 美股期货在英伟达测试前持稳
item.description: 周三，美国股指期货小幅走高，本周初曾一度下跌，投资者关注的焦点是英伟达（Nvidia）当天晚些时候的财报，这可能会成为人工智能交易的决定性时刻。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were slightly higher on Wednesday, having clocked declines at the start of the week, with investor focus on Nvidia's earnings later in the day which could prove to be a make-or-break moment for the AI trade.】

item.title: Amundi的Mortier担心美联储独立性，对大型股持谨慎态度
item.description: 欧洲最大资产管理公司的首席投资官周三表示，美国联邦储备委员会的独立性在2026年仍有受损的风险。【原文：Damage to the independence of the U.S. Federal Reserve remains a risk going into 2026, the chief investment officer of Europe's largest asset manager said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 西班牙将调查 Meta 公司涉嫌侵犯用户隐私的行为
item.description: 西班牙首相佩德罗-桑切斯（Pedro Sanchez）周三表示，西班牙政府将对 Facebook 和 Instagram 所有者 Meta 可能侵犯其社交媒体应用程序用户隐私的行为进行调查。【原文：Spain's Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez said on Wednesday his government would investigate Facebook and Instagram owner Meta for possible violation of privacy of users of its social media applications.】

item.title: 澳大利亚希望更多盟国加入其重要矿产储备计划
item.description: 澳大利亚贸易部长周三表示，自澳大利亚上个月与美国签署协议以来，包括欧盟在内的盟国对澳大利亚的战略关键矿产储备表现出了更大的兴趣。【原文：Australia is seeing more interest in its strategic critical minerals reserve from allies including the European Union since it signed a deal with the United States last month, Australia's trade minister said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 阿联酋航空披露 8 架空客 A350-900 订单
item.description: 迪拜的阿联酋航空公司周三透露了一份此前未公开的8架空客A350-900喷气机订单，一天前还排除了立即订购更大的A350-1000飞机的可能性。【原文：Dubai's Emirates revealed a previously undisclosed order for eight Airbus A350-900 jets on Wednesday, a day after ruling out an immediate order for larger A350-1000 aircraft.】

item.title: 美国农业局称，美国感恩节晚餐成本连续第三年下降
item.description: 周三公布的一项调查显示，由于火鸡价格大幅打折，10 人份感恩节晚餐的价格将连续第三年下降，但美国节日餐桌上的典型食品中，约有一半比去年贵。【原文：The cost of a Thanksgiving dinner for 10 will be lower for a third straight year thanks to steep discounting in turkey prices, but about half the items that grace a typical U.S. holiday table are pricier than last year, a survey out on Wednesday shows.】

item.title: 波音获得迪拜航空公司喷气机订单，卷土重来
item.description: 波音公司周三在迪拜航展上反击，向迪拜航空公司（flydubai）临时订购了 75 架 737 MAX 喷气式飞机，而在此前一天，波音公司的长期客户迪拜航空公司（flydubai）向其老对手空中客车公司（Airbus）订购了 150 架 A321neo 竞争型飞机。【原文：Boeing hit back at the Dubai Airshow with a provisional order for 75 of its 737 MAX jets from flydubai on Wednesday, a day after the long-time Boeing customer handed an order for 150 competing A321neo aircraft to its arch-rival Airbus .】

item.title: 欧盟法院驳回亚马逊取消欧盟技术标签的请求
item.description: 欧盟普通法院周三驳回了亚马逊提出的取消其作为受欧盟网络内容规则更严格要求的平台的请求。【原文：The European Union's General Court on Wednesday dismissed a request by Amazon to scrap its designation as a platform subject to stricter requirements under EU online content rules.】
